name: Konjiki no Gash Bell!! Go! Go! Mamono Fight!!
name_original: Konjiki no Gash Bell!! Go! Go! Mamono Fight!!
description: Konjiki no Gash Bell!! Go! Go! Mamono Fight!! is a video game released in Japan for the PlayStation 2 based on the Konjiki no Gash Bell!! anime/manga series (Zatch Bell! outside Japan).
